name: pfxnndmnd
body: |- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cn0))), wceq(co(c0, cpfx, c1), emptycls))

stmt.origin: mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, cn0, cpfx, co(cv(hs0), csubstr, cop(nat0, cv(hs1))))
stmt.pretty: mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, cn0, cpfx, (hs0[substr]< 0, hs1 >))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cn0))), wceq(co(c0, cpfx, c1), emptycls))
-| wceq(cpfx, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, cn0, co(cv(hs0), csubstr, cop(nat0, cv(hs1)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, cn0)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
-| diffsc(hs1, cn0)
body.pretty:
⊢ (¬(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→(c0[prefix]c1)= ∅)
⊣ prefix =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(hs0[substr]< 0, hs1 >))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs0, ℕ0)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs1, ℕ0)
